title: Macron urges Europe to start acting like world power
summary_full: The French president warns of growing threats from China, Russia and now the US, saying Europe faces a "wake-up call".
summary_public: The French president warns of growing threats from China, Russia and now the US, saying Europe faces a "wake-up call".
